translated: The first, the earrings and necklace, are AmitƒÅbha and Ratnasa·πÉbhava in the form of semen and blood, respectively, and Vajradhara and NairƒÅtmya are born and disintegrate in the nature of the moon and sun, respectively.

original: mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen gtso //
analyzed: mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen gtso //

original: zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: zhes pa'i tshig gis so //

original: k'a li n'a dang a'a li'i n'a da dbyer med pa dag rdo rje gsum dang ye shes lnga'i @58a * //
analyzed: k'a li n'a dang a'a li'i n'a da dbyer med pa dag rdo rje gsum dang ye shes lnga'i @58a * //

original: bdag nyid bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyi de kho na nyid gnyis su med pa'i de kho na nyid dang ldan pa'i rgyan bstan zin pa'i don to //

original: gzhan yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang gsungs pa /

analyzed: de'i / bgo ba stag gi pags pa nyid //

analyzed: bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed de // zhes pa ni /

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /

analyzed: stag gi pags pa zhes pa ste sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyis spro ba'i nga dag nyid kyi des so //

analyzed: de nyid bza' ba ste 'khril ba'o //

analyzed: de ltar rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i sku rdo rje'i rigs kyi rim par phye ba mdo dang rgyas par bstan to //

analyzed: rang 'dod lha zhes pa ni bdag gi 'dod pa'i lha gang yin pa de'i rigs kyis so //

analyzed: de nyid sa bon te yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de bcug pa ni dmigs par byas pas so //

analyzed: spyod pa bya bar @60b rtogs par bya // zhes yang slar brjod do //

analyzed: mig ni lta ba'o //

analyzed: 'di zhes pa ni 'di lta bu khyer nas dngos su 'khyam par bya bar rigs pa yin no //

analyzed: rdo rje rigs kyi dngos med na //

analyzed: rang 'dod lha'i rigs kyis bya'o //

original: zhes pa la rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'o //

analyzed: 'di'i rang bzhin gyis na rigs ni bgrangs nas yongs su gcod pas na rdo rje'i rigs so / tshul 'dis med pa ni dngos med pa'o //
translated: The non-entity by this method is non-entity.

analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje rigs kyi dngos med pa bdag med pa rtogs pa'o // rang 'dod lha'i rigs kyis bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the non-entity of the vajra family is the realization of selflessness.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /

analyzed: rang gi sgra ni rnam par shes pa'o //

analyzed: rnam pa gnyis ka yang dbyer med par byas pa kun du bzang po'i spyod pa la 'jug pa yin par dgongs so //

original: yang na zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no //
analyzed: yang na zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no //

original: gzhan gyi rigs las byung zhes pa la /
analyzed: gzhan gyi rigs las byung zhes pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúArisen from another family‚Äù means

original: gzhan ni zla med pa gcig go //
analyzed: gzhan ni zla med pa gcig go //
translated: ‚Äúanother‚Äù is the unique one.

original: des gang gi rigs yongs su gcad pa de ni gzhan rdo rje 'dzin na'o //
analyzed: des gang gi rigs yongs su gcad pa de ni gzhan rdo rje 'dzin na'o //
translated: That which is delimited by its family is the other, Vajradhara.

original: de las byung ba ni der gyur par byung ba rab tu gsal te /
analyzed: de las byung ba ni der gyur par byung ba rab tu gsal te /
translated: ‚ÄúArisen from that‚Äù is clearly arisen as having become that.

original: 'khor ba kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid gang bdag med pa de ni don dam pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'khor ba kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid gang bdag med pa de ni don dam pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Samsara, which is the nature of relative truth, is the nature of ultimate truth, which is the nature of emptiness.

original: cis khyad par du 'phags she na /
analyzed: cis khyad par du 'phags she na /
translated: How is it superior?

original: byang chub kyi sa bon bcug pa ni byang chub kyi sa bon bcug pa ste byang chub rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye @61a * //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sa bon bcug pa ni byang chub kyi sa bon bcug pa ste byang chub rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye @61a * //
translated: The planting of the seed of enlightenment is the planting of the seed of the non-conceptual intuition of enlightenment.

original: shes so // de nyid sa bon no //
analyzed: shes so // de nyid sa bon no //
translated: That itself is the seed.

original: der gzhug pa ni dmigs pa'o //üîΩdes sbyangs pa ni 'dus byas pa'i tshul can kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: der gzhug pa ni dmigs pa'o // des sbyangs pa ni 'dus byas pa'i tshul can kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The planting of that is the meditative object.üîΩThe purification by that is the conventional reality which has the mode of the compounded.

original: 'dis ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid kyis don dam pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: 'dis ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid kyis don dam pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin nyid de /
translated: By means of the conventional reality, it is the ultimate reality itself.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa'i tshul gyis kyang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin no //
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa'i tshul gyis kyang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin no //
translated: By means of the ultimate reality, it is the conventional reality itself.

original: gnyi ga dbyer med pa bdag med rnal 'byor ma rdo rje gsum dbyer med dang thugs rdo rje lha'i rim par phye ba mdo dang rgyas par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gnyi ga dbyer med pa bdag med rnal 'byor ma rdo rje gsum dbyer med dang thugs rdo rje lha'i rim par phye ba mdo dang rgyas par bstan pa yin no //
translated: The inseparability of the two is the nature of Nairatmya-VajrayoginI, the inseparability of the three vajras, and the division of the deities of the mind vajra.

original: de lta bur gyur pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas spyod pa bya bar rigs pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas spyod pa bya bar rigs pa yin te /
translated: The yogin who is endowed with such a nature is fit to perform the conduct.

original: de gal te dga' ba'i dbang gis glu len par byed na /
analyzed: de gal te dga' ba'i dbang gis glu len par byed na /
translated: If he sings through the power of joy,

original: de'i tshe de ji lta bu yin pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i tshe de ji lta bu yin pa gsungs pa /
translated: then at that time, how is it?

original: gal te dga' bas glu blangs te //
analyzed: gal te dga' bas glu blangs te //
translated: If he sings through joy,

original: 'on kyang dga' ba rdo rje mchog dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'i glu des blangs te 'di nyid thar pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang dga' ba rdo rje mchog dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'i glu des blangs te 'di nyid thar pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: then through that vajra song endowed with the supreme vajra of joy, this itself is the cause of liberation.

original: gal te dga' ba skyes pa na //
analyzed: gal te dga' ba skyes pa na //
translated: If joy arises,

original: thar pa'i rgyus ni gar byas te //
analyzed: thar pa'i rgyus ni gar byas te //
translated: then dance with the cause of liberation.

original: 'o na rdo rje'i rkang pas gar //
analyzed: 'o na rdo rje'i rkang pas gar //
translated: Then dance with the vajra feet,

original: yo gi'i mnyam par bzhag pas byed //
analyzed: yo gi'i mnyam par bzhag pas byed //
translated: the equipoise of yoga.

original: ces bya ba ni gal te dga' ba skyes nas rnal 'byor pa gar rtsom pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba de'i tshe gar dang bro'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni gal te dga' ba skyes nas rnal 'byor pa gar rtsom pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba de'i tshe gar dang bro'o //
translated: If joy arises, then at that time, when the yogi begins to dance, it is dance and song.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: rdo rje rkang pas te /
analyzed: rdo rje rkang pas te /
translated: By the vajra feet.üîΩJust as the Lord of the Dharma realm presses down with his feet, so the glorious Heruka abides.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid kyi ro mnan pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi rkang pas dpal he ru ka gnas pa de bzhin du rdo rje'i rkang pas te /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid kyi ro mnan pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi rkang pas dpal he ru ka gnas pa de bzhin du rdo rje'i rkang pas te /
translated: In the same way, by the vajra feet,

original: g-yas brkyang ba la sogs pa rkang stabs brgyad kyis mnyam par bzhag pas de kho na nyid la sems zhen pas so //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang ba la sogs pa rkang stabs brgyad kyis mnyam par bzhag pas de kho na nyid la sems zhen pas so //
translated: By means of the eight postures, such as the right leg extended, etc., the mind is fixed on reality by equipoise.

original: yang na de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa'i glu ni /
analyzed: yang na de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa'i glu ni /
translated: Or else, the song of the yogi of reality is

original: a'a li k'a li'i bdag nyid kyi sgra blangs nas sgra yul du byed pa ste sgra la sgra thim pas cha med pa nyid kyis dga' ba'o //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li'i bdag nyid kyi sgra blangs nas sgra yul du byed pa ste sgra la sgra thim pas cha med pa nyid kyis dga' ba'o //
translated: the sound taken as the nature of ƒÅlikƒÅli, which is the object of sound, and the joy of sound dissolving into sound, because of being partless.

original: rgyu de'i phyir 'on kyang rdo rje rkang pa dang ldan pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rnyed pa nyid do //
analyzed: rgyu de'i phyir 'on kyang rdo rje rkang pa dang ldan pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rnyed pa nyid do //
translated: For that reason, moreover, one obtains the nondual intuition endowed with the vajra body.

original: mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa rnam par dga' ba la thug pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa rnam par dga' ba la thug pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: Supreme means especially exalted, up to the climax of joy.

original: rdo rje gsum dbyer med pas dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba mdo dang rgyas par bstan pa'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum dbyer med pas dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba mdo dang rgyas par bstan pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the brief and extensive teachings of the stages of consecration by the indivisibility of the three vajras is

original: gal te ni de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te ni de'i phyir ro //
translated: if, for that reason,

original: dga' ba ni rnam par dga' ba'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni rnam par dga' ba'o //
translated: joy is the climax of joy,

original: skyes pa ni gar sgyur ba'o //
analyzed: skyes pa ni gar sgyur ba'o //
translated: and the born is the dance.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: thar ba'i rgyus te thar pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: thar ba'i rgyus te thar pa'i don du'o //
translated: for the sake of liberation, i.e., for the sake of the goal of liberation.

original: 'o na ni de'i tshe'o //
analyzed: 'o na ni de'i tshe'o //
translated: Well then, at that time?

original: rdo rje rkang pas te /
analyzed: rdo rje rkang pas te /
translated: with vajra feet,

original: dbyer @61b med pa'i ye shes kyi dga' ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: dbyer @61b med pa'i ye shes kyi dga' ba la sogs pas so //
translated: with the indivisible gnosis of joy, etc.

original: gar byed pa ni gar nges par gnas par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gar byed pa ni gar nges par gnas par 'byung ngo //
translated: Dancing, i.e., dancing, is produced.

original: de bas na rnal 'byor pa gnyi ga dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na rnal 'byor pa gnyi ga dbyer med pa'o //
translated: Therefore, both yogas are indivisible.

original: de nyid mnyam gzhag ste mi mthun pa med par gnas pa'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid mnyam gzhag ste mi mthun pa med par gnas pa'i don to //
translated: That itself is equipoise, i.e., the meaning of abiding without conflict.

original: 'dis ni ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi de kho na nyid des de kho na nyid kyi rim par phye ba mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi de kho na nyid des de kho na nyid kyi rim par phye ba mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bstan pa yin no //
translated: By this, the brief teaching of the divisions of reality by means of that reality which is the nature of the five gnoses is explained in detail.

original: da ni rus pa'i rgyan la sogs pa gang rnal 'byor pas brgyan pa de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni rus pa'i rgyan la sogs pa gang rnal 'byor pas brgyan pa de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the purity of those ornaments such as bone ornaments with which the yogi is adorned is taught.

original: 'khor lo'i gzugs kyi mi bskyod pa na /
analyzed: 'khor lo'i gzugs kyi mi bskyod pa na /
translated: Akshobhya in the form of a wheel

original: spyi bor 'khor lo rnam par 'dzin //
analyzed: spyi bor 'khor lo rnam par 'dzin //
translated: holds a wheel on the crown.

original: zhes mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the detailed explanation of the brief teaching.

original: rna cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med ni //
analyzed: rna cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med ni //
translated: Amitabha, who is the nature of earrings,

original: rna ba dag la rna cha bzang //
analyzed: rna ba dag la rna cha bzang //
translated: The earrings are on the ears.

original: zhes mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the extensive explanation of the brief introduction.

original: mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen gtso //üîΩzhes pa ste /
analyzed: mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen gtso // zhes pa ste /
translated: The necklace is the chief jewel.

original: mgrin par rus pa'i phreng ba ste //üîΩzhes bstan pa'i'o //
analyzed: mgrin par rus pa'i phreng ba ste // zhes bstan pa'i'o //
translated: The garland of bones is on the neck.

original: lag par rnam par snang mdzad brjod pa ni /
analyzed: lag par rnam par snang mdzad brjod pa ni /
translated: The explanation of Vairocana on the hands is

original: lag pa dag la lag gdub gnyis //üîΩzhes pa gang ngo //
analyzed: lag pa dag la lag gdub gnyis // zhes pa gang ngo //
translated: the two bracelets on the hands.üîΩThe navel is Amoghasiddhi.

analyzed: ska rags la ni don yod gnas // zhes pa ni // rked pa la yang ska rags nyid // ces pa gang gi'o //
translated: The girdle is on the waist.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rnam par dag pa phyag rgya lnga'i rim par phye ba bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rnam par dag pa phyag rgya lnga'i rim par phye ba bstan pa yin te /
translated: Thus, the five Tathagatas are taught to be the five mudras.üîΩThe wheel, the earrings, the necklace,

original: 'khor lo rna cha mgul gdub dang // lag gdub dang ni ske rags nyid //
analyzed: 'khor lo rna cha mgul gdub dang // lag gdub dang ni ske rags nyid //
translated: the bracelets, and the girdle

original: sangs rgyas lnga yi rnam dag pa //üîΩ'di rnams phyag rgyar rab tu grags //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga yi rnam dag pa // 'di rnams phyag rgyar rab tu grags //
translated: are the purities of the five Buddhas.

original: zhes pas so //
analyzed: zhes pas so //
translated: These are well known as the mudras.

original: 'di ni mkha' 'gro ma'i rnam par dag pa de rnams kyang rus pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan du 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni mkha' 'gro ma'i rnam par dag pa de rnams kyang rus pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan du 'dod pa yin no //
translated: This is the assertion that the purities of the dakinis are the ornament of the bone-garland.üîΩThe anklets are on the feet,

original: rkang par de bzhin rkang gdub po ni rkang pa dag thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin a'a li k'a li'i n'a da'i bdag nyid rkang gdub rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rkang par de bzhin rkang gdub po ni rkang pa dag thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin a'a li k'a li'i n'a da'i bdag nyid rkang gdub rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: the anklets are the purity of the nƒÅda of ƒÄlikƒÅli, the nature of method and wisdom.

original: lag pa'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan nyid //
analyzed: lag pa'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan nyid //
translated: The bracelets are on the wrists,

original: ces pa ni gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rnam par dag pa'i rgyan rnams nyid spro ba dang bsdu ba'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: ces pa ni gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rnam par dag pa'i rgyan rnams nyid spro ba dang bsdu ba'i bdag nyid do //
translated: both are the ornament of the purity of Vajradhara, the nature of emanation and re-absorption.

original: bgo ba stag gi pags pa nyid //
analyzed: bgo ba stag gi pags pa nyid //
translated: The garment is the tiger skin,

original: ces pa ni de rnams spro ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyis so //
analyzed: ces pa ni de rnams spro ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyis so //
translated: the nature of the emanation of those.

original: bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed bcas //
analyzed: bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed bcas //
translated: The food is human flesh and blood,

original: zhes pa ni 'di rnams bsdu ba'i bdag nyid yin no //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'di rnams bsdu ba'i bdag nyid yin no //
translated: the nature of the re-absorption of those.

original: yang na mi bskyod pa ni mi 'khrugs shing mi g-yo bas na mi bskyod pa ste /
analyzed: yang na mi bskyod pa ni mi 'khrugs shing mi g-yo bas na mi bskyod pa ste /
translated: Alternatively, Ak·π£obhya is immovable and unshakable.

original: mi rgyu ba'i rang bzhin @62a * //
analyzed: mi rgyu ba'i rang bzhin @62a * //
translated: The nature of non-movement is Ak·π£obhya.

original: 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi shes pa gcod par byed pa'i rnam pa des so //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi shes pa gcod par byed pa'i rnam pa des so //
translated: By the aspect of cutting off ignorance in the form of a wheel.

original: rna cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med //
analyzed: rna cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med //
translated: The nature of the ear-ring is Amitabha.

original: ces pa ni dpag med ni dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni dpag med ni dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: The meaning of aprameya is immeasurable.

original: 'od ni 'od zer ro //
analyzed: 'od ni 'od zer ro //
translated: Light is rays.

analyzed: spro ba'i rang bzhin rnams kyi bya ba gang la yod pa ni 'od dpag med do //
translated: The one who has the activity of the nature of emission is Amitabha.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: rna cha'i bskor ba'i rang bzhin khyab pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rna cha'i bskor ba'i rang bzhin khyab pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don to //

original: dga' ba bskyed pas na rin chen te thugs so //
analyzed: dga' ba bskyed pas na rin chen te thugs so //
translated: The jewel is the mind that generates joy.

original: de'i gtso bo ni mnga' bdag go //
analyzed: de'i gtso bo ni mnga' bdag go //
translated: The lord of that is the master.

original: de ni mgrin pa'i phreng ba stong pa nyid bcu drug gi rang bzhin no //üîΩlag par rnam par snang mdzad brjod //
analyzed: de ni mgrin pa'i phreng ba stong pa nyid bcu drug gi rang bzhin no // lag par rnam par snang mdzad brjod //
translated: That is the garland of the throat, the nature of the sixteen emptinesses.

original: ces pa ni /
analyzed: ces pa ni /
translated: The one who is called Vairochana is in the hand.

original: dbang po lnga po gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi yul te rnam par ni nges par ro //
analyzed: dbang po lnga po gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi yul te rnam par ni nges par ro //
translated: The object of both the two natures of the five senses is ascertained.

original: snang mdzad ni rab tu gsal ba'i rnam par gnas pas rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: snang mdzad ni rab tu gsal ba'i rnam par gnas pas rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: Vairochana is the one who abides in the form of clear light.

original: ska rags ni chos 'byung du gnas pa dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: ska rags ni chos 'byung du gnas pa dbyer med pa'o //
translated: The belt is the indivisible reality source.

original: don yod ni 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas 'gro ba'i don byed par nus pa'i don to //
analyzed: don yod ni 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas 'gro ba'i don byed par nus pa'i don to //
translated: The ‚Äúsuccessful‚Äù is the meaning of being able to perform the aim of the world, since it is not without fruit.

original: kha tv'am gzugs shes rab ste //
analyzed: kha tv'am gzugs shes rab ste //
translated: The kha·π≠vƒÅ·πÖga is wisdom.

original: zhes pas rdo rje'i bu mo rang 'dod lha'i gzugs kyis bya /
analyzed: zhes pas rdo rje'i bu mo rang 'dod lha'i gzugs kyis bya /
translated: Thus, the vajra girl should be made in the form of the desired deity.

original: yang na gzhan gyi rigs las byung ba khyer la /
analyzed: yang na gzhan gyi rigs las byung ba khyer la /

original: spyod pa bya bar rtogs par bya //
analyzed: spyod pa bya bar rtogs par bya //
translated: One should understand that one should perform the conduct.

original: zhes gang gsungs pa de'i rnam par dag pa bstan to //üîΩshes rab kha tv'am ga yi sku //
analyzed: zhes gang gsungs pa de'i rnam par dag pa bstan to // shes rab kha tv'am ga yi sku //
translated: This teaches the purification of that.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: The kha·π≠vƒÅ·πÖga is the form of wisdom.

analyzed: g-yon pa nas kyang kha tv'am ga / zhes kyang gsungs pa de yang shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The kha·π≠vƒÅ·πÖga also is of the nature of wisdom, since it is also said that it is from the left.

original: 'dis ni rnal 'byor pas kha tv'am ga yang bcang bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni rnal 'byor pas kha tv'am ga yang bcang bar bya ba yin no //
translated: By this, the kha·π≠vƒÅ·πÖga should be held by the practitioner.

analyzed: yang na kha tv'am ga gzugs shes rab can te zhes pa ni nam mkha' la 'gro bas na kha tva'm ga ste mkha' spyod do //üîΩde nyid aam ga gzugs can te /
translated: Or else, the kha·π≠vƒÅ·πÖga is the form of wisdom.

original: 'ongs nas rtogs pas na aam ga la 'di'i rang bzhin gang la yod pa de la'o //
analyzed: 'ongs nas rtogs pas na aam ga la 'di'i rang bzhin gang la yod pa de la'o //
translated: Since one has come and realized, it is a·πÖgala.

original: shes rab ni shes rab kyi sgras yi ge aa la sogs pa dbyangs bcu bzhi'i rjes su song ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab ni shes rab kyi sgras yi ge aa la sogs pa dbyangs bcu bzhi'i rjes su song ba'o //
translated: Wisdom is the fourteen vowels beginning with a.

original: 'dis ni mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga a'a li'i n'a da yin par bstan to //üîΩthabs kyi gzugs kyis cang te'u nyid //
analyzed: 'dis ni mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga a'a li'i n'a da yin par bstan to // thabs kyi gzugs kyis cang te'u nyid //
translated: This shows that the fifteen dakinis are the vowels.

original: ces pa ni /
analyzed: ces pa ni /
translated: The hand drum is itself the form of method.

original: cang te'u de yang bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: cang te'u de yang bcang bar bya'o //
translated: The hand drum should be held.

original: de yang thabs kyi gzugs kyis thabs rnam par dag pas so //üîΩyang na / thabs kyi gzugs kyis cang te'u nyid //
analyzed: de yang thabs kyi gzugs kyis thabs rnam par dag pas so // yang na / thabs kyi gzugs kyis cang te'u nyid //

original: ces pa ni //
analyzed: ces pa ni //
translated: Or, the hand drum is itself the form of method.

original: rigs lnga rnams su 'khyam par bya //
analyzed: rigs lnga rnams su 'khyam par bya //
translated: One should wander in the five clans.

analyzed: de yang thabs kyi rang bzhin a'a li'i n'a da yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Moreover, it is the form of method, and so it is the vowels of the nature of method.

original: 'dis ni a'a li k'a li'i n'a da gnyis kyi bdag nyid des rnal 'byor par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis ni a'a li k'a li'i n'a da gnyis kyi bdag nyid des rnal 'byor par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, he becomes a yogi with the nature of the two nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s of AlikƒÅli.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: zhe sdang rnam par dag pas te mi bskyod pa'i rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang rnam par dag pas te mi bskyod pa'i rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: By the purity of hatred, by the purity of Ak·π£obhya.üîΩOr else,

original: yang na / zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa //üîΩzhes pa ni /
analyzed: yang na / zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa // zhes pa ni /
translated: the yogi of pure hatred

original: he ru ka sbyor skyes bu nyid //
analyzed: he ru ka sbyor skyes bu nyid //
translated: is the one who is born from the union with Heruka.

original: ces gang gsungs pa de'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: ces gang gsungs pa de'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation of what was said.üîΩOr else,

original: yang na / zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: yang na / zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa //
translated: the yogi of pure hatred

original: zhes pa ni gnyid dbyer mi phyed pa nyid kyis rnal 'byor ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gnyid dbyer mi phyed pa nyid kyis rnal 'byor ba'o //
translated: is the yogi by the indivisibility of sleep.

original: de nyid zhe sdang ngo //
analyzed: de nyid zhe sdang ngo //
translated: That is hatred.

original: de yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'od dpag tu med pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'od dpag tu med pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid do //
translated: And that is of various kinds, the nature of AmitƒÅbha, and so on.üîΩThat is,

original: de ni / du ma rigs ni rigs pas na //
analyzed: de ni / du ma rigs ni rigs pas na //
translated: the many types are reasonable,

original: gang phyir dbye ba mtshon mi bya //
analyzed: gang phyir dbye ba mtshon mi bya //
translated: because the divisions are not indicated.

original: zhes te 'khor lo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i rnam par dag pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te 'khor lo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i rnam par dag pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The purities of the wheel and so on are Ak·π£obhya and so on.

original: n'a da gnyis kyi bdag nyid thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin rnams rnam par dag par gyur pa yin pas zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: n'a da gnyis kyi bdag nyid thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin rnams rnam par dag par gyur pa yin pas zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa yin no //
translated: Since the two nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s are the nature of method and wisdom, they are pure, and the nature of the vajra holder, the yogin of pure anger.

original: 'dis ni rnal 'byor pa'i phyag rgya lnga rnams bstan pa de rnam par dag pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni rnal 'byor pa'i phyag rgya lnga rnams bstan pa de rnam par dag pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: This explains the five symbolic ornaments of the yogin. Their purity is Ak·π£obhya, and so on.

original: rkang gdub ni thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: rkang gdub ni thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The anklets are the aspect of the purity of method and wisdom.

original: dpung rgyan thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: dpung rgyan thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The armlets are the purity of method and wisdom.

original: stag gi pags pa thabs kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: stag gi pags pa thabs kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The tiger-skin skirt is the purity of method.

original: bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed ni shes rab rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed ni shes rab rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The half-necklace of human bone is the purity of wisdom.

original: he ru ka sbyor skyes bu nyid ni des rnal 'byor ba rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: he ru ka sbyor skyes bu nyid ni des rnal 'byor ba rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The nature of the person born from the union of Heruka is the purity of the yogin.

original: rigs lnga rnams su 'khyam par bya ba la sogs pa gang phyir phye ba mtshon mi bya'i mthar zhe sdang rnam par dag pas rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rigs lnga rnams su 'khyam par bya ba la sogs pa gang phyir phye ba mtshon mi bya'i mthar zhe sdang rnam par dag pas rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The five families are not to be distinguished in terms of wandering in the five destinies, and so forth, but are ultimately pure by the purity of hatred.

original: shing gcig la sogs pa ni me long la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: shing gcig la sogs pa ni me long la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The solitary tree and so forth are the nature of the five intuitions, mirror and so forth.

original: dben pa'am bas mtha' ni thabs dang shes rab kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: dben pa'am bas mtha' ni thabs dang shes rab kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Solitary places and remote valleys are the purity of means and insight.

original: spyod pa'i dngos grub kyang rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa thabs dang shes rab kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa'i dngos grub kyang rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa thabs dang shes rab kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The power of conduct is the purity of means and insight, which are the cause and effect.

original: rdo rje'i bu mo la sogs pa yang gnyis su med par rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i bu mo la sogs pa yang gnyis su med par rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The vajra girl and so forth are the purity of nonduality.

original: glu dang gar gyi rnam par dag pa yang da ni bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: glu dang gar gyi rnam par dag pa yang da ni bstan par bya ste /
translated: Now the purity of song and dance is to be explained.

original: glu ni rnam dag sngags @63a * //
analyzed: glu ni rnam dag sngags @63a * //
translated: Song is the purity of mantra.

original: su gnas // zhes pa ni sgra nyid sngags kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: su gnas // zhes pa ni sgra nyid sngags kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Sound itself is the nature of mantra.

original: yang na ye shes kyi rang bzhin nyid n'a da yin te /
analyzed: yang na ye shes kyi rang bzhin nyid n'a da yin te /
translated: Or else, the nature of intuition is the nada.

original: 'dis ni gal te glu len par byed na de tshe rdo rje mchog dang ldan no zhes pa de'i rnam par dag pa bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni gal te glu len par byed na de tshe rdo rje mchog dang ldan no zhes pa de'i rnam par dag pa bstan to //
translated: This shows the purification: if one sings, then one has the supreme vajra.

original: gar ni bsgom par bya ba nyid //
analyzed: gar ni bsgom par bya ba nyid //
translated: Dancing is just meditation.

original: ces pa ni gar ni g-yo ba ste sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su spro ba gang de bsgom pa bsam gtan dang lha'i rnam par dkyil 'khor bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni gar ni g-yo ba ste sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su spro ba gang de bsgom pa bsam gtan dang lha'i rnam par dkyil 'khor bskyod pa'o //
translated: Dancing is movement, the emanation of various forms. That is meditation, concentration, and the divine form of the mandala.

original: yang na gar ni spro ba'o //
analyzed: yang na gar ni spro ba'o //
translated: Or else, dancing is emanation.

original: de'i bsgom pa ni snyoms par 'jug par bsdu ba ste spro ba dang bsdu bar dbyer med pa 'di nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i bsgom pa ni snyoms par 'jug par bsdu ba ste spro ba dang bsdu bar dbyer med pa 'di nyid yin no //
translated: Its meditation is the gathering into meditative concentration, which is the indivisibility of emanation and gathering.

original: 'dis ni gal te dga' ba skyes pa na thar ba'i rgyus ni gar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni gal te dga' ba skyes pa na thar ba'i rgyus ni gar bya'o //
translated: This shows the purification: if one feels joy, then one should dance with the cause of liberation.

original: de tshe rdo rje rkang pas gar bya zhes bya ba 'di'i rnam par dag pa'o //üîΩde'i phyir na glu dang gar /
analyzed: de tshe rdo rje rkang pas gar bya zhes bya ba 'di'i rnam par dag pa'o // de'i phyir na glu dang gar /
translated: Then one should dance with the vajra feet.üîΩTherefore, one should always sing and dance.

original: yo gi rtag tu byed ces pa ni rgyu de'i phyir na glu ni sngags so //
analyzed: yo gi rtag tu byed ces pa ni rgyu de'i phyir na glu ni sngags so //
translated: Because of that cause, one should always sing and dance.

original: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ni gar ro //
analyzed: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ni gar ro //
translated: Song is mantra, and the mandala of wisdom is dance.

original: bsgom pa dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: bsgom pa dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The meditation is the mandala of the commitment being.

original: gnyi ga yang gnyi ga'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang gnyi ga'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Both are the nature of both.

original: byed pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The action is the completion.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: yo gi rtag par rgyun du byed //
analyzed: yo gi rtag par rgyun du byed //
translated: the yogi/nƒ´ always practices.

original: ces pa ni rgyun ma chad pa nyid kyis yin no //
analyzed: ces pa ni rgyun ma chad pa nyid kyis yin no //
translated: This is because of the uninterrupted nature.

original: yang na glu ni gsung rdo rje'o //
analyzed: yang na glu ni gsung rdo rje'o //
translated: Or, the song is the vajra of speech.

original: gar sku rdo rje'o //
analyzed: gar sku rdo rje'o //
translated: The dance is the vajra of body.

original: gnyi ga yang rnal 'byor ba rnal 'byor gyi bdag nyid dbyer med par rtogs pas rnam par gnas so //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang rnal 'byor ba rnal 'byor gyi bdag nyid dbyer med par rtogs pas rnam par gnas so //
translated: Both are the nature of the union of the yogi/nƒ´, realized as inseparable.

original: gnyi ga yang sems la rag las pa yin pa'i phyir /üîΩrdo rje gsum dbyer med pa nyid do //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang sems la rag las pa yin pa'i phyir / rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa nyid do //
translated: Both depend on the mind,üîΩso they are inseparable vajras.

original: de nyid rtag par rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid kyis rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i rnal 'byor ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid rtag par rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid kyis rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i rnal 'byor ba'o //
translated: That very inseparability of the three vajras is the yoga of the inseparability of the three vajras.

original: de yis sku gsung thugs ji srid du byed pa'i srid du byed de kho na nyid du 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: de yis sku gsung thugs ji srid du byed pa'i srid du byed de kho na nyid du 'jug pa yin no //
translated: That is the engagement in reality, which is the performance of the body, speech, and mind for as long as possible.

original: 'di ni kun du bzang po'i spyod pa de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor bas yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni kun du bzang po'i spyod pa de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor bas yin no //
translated: This is the yoga of reality, the conduct of Samantabhadra.

original: bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed de //
analyzed: bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed de //
translated: The food is the half-month of immortality.

original: zhes gang gsungs pa de'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes gang gsungs pa de'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
translated: The result of that is stated:

original: sman ni rnam par bza' ba ste //
analyzed: sman ni rnam par bza' ba ste //
translated: The medicine is the eating,

original: chu ni rnam par btung ba nyid //
analyzed: chu ni rnam par btung ba nyid //
translated: and the water is the drinking.

original: rga shis zil gyis mi non cing //
analyzed: rga shis zil gyis mi non cing //
translated: Not overcome by old age and death,

original: rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: one always becomes protected.

original: sman ni bdud rtsi lnga po de bza' bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: sman ni bdud rtsi lnga po de bza' bar bya ba'o //
translated: The medicine is the five nectars that are to be eaten.

original: chu zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems de btung bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: chu zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems de btung bar bya ba'o //
translated: The water is the bodhicitta that is to be drunk.

original: de ltar dam tshig gnyi ga yang 'di nyid kyis bskang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar dam tshig gnyi ga yang 'di nyid kyis bskang bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, both pledges are fulfilled by this.

original: de nas rgas pa ni 'khogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas rgas pa ni 'khogs pa'o //
translated: Then, old age is decrepitude.

original: 'chi ba ni 'chi ba'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba ni 'chi ba'o //
translated: Death is dying.

original: 'di gnyis kyis zil gyis mi @63b non pa ni na tsha 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di gnyis kyis zil gyis mi @63b non pa ni na tsha 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Not overcome by these two is not becoming ill.

original: gang las she na /
analyzed: gang las she na /
translated: From what?

original: gang las rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba yin pa'o //
analyzed: gang las rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba yin pa'o //
translated: From what one always becomes protected.üîΩOr,

original: yang na / sman ni rnam par bza' ba ste //
analyzed: yang na / sman ni rnam par bza' ba ste //
translated: the medicine is the eating,

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: and the water is the drinking.

original: rang bzhin med par byas pa bdud rtsi lnga me long la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin med par byas pa bdud rtsi lnga me long la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'o //
translated: The five nectars, which are made essenceless, are the five gnoses of mirror-like and so forth.

original: 'di'i phyir na btung ba'i chu byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: 'di'i phyir na btung ba'i chu byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: For this reason, the water to be drunk is the thought of awakening.

original: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i ye shes bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i ye shes bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: The wisdom of the inseparability of emptiness and compassion should be protected.

original: rtag tu ni rtag par rgyun ma chad pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rtag tu ni rtag par rgyun ma chad pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Always means by the very continuity of constancy.

original: de nas rga shis zil gyis mi non cing ni rgas pa dang 'chi ba zhes bya ba 'di rtog par gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de nas rga shis zil gyis mi non cing ni rgas pa dang 'chi ba zhes bya ba 'di rtog par gnas pa ste /
translated: Then, not overcome by old age and death, this so-called old age and death is imagined to be a location.

original: yang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid de ni nad thams cad yongs su spangs pa'i phyir gnod pa gnyi ga yang rnam pa thams cad nyid du med do //
analyzed: yang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid de ni nad thams cad yongs su spangs pa'i phyir gnod pa gnyi ga yang rnam pa thams cad nyid du med do //
translated: Moreover, that which has the nature of nonconceptual wisdom is free from all disease, and therefore both harms are completely nonexistent.

original: de nyid rgas pa dang 'chi ba de'i bsrung bar gyur pa rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid rgas pa dang 'chi ba de'i bsrung bar gyur pa rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: That very old age and death is its protection, which becomes constant and uninterrupted.

original: yang na / sman ni rnam par bza' ba ste //
analyzed: yang na / sman ni rnam par bza' ba ste //
translated: The medicine is to be eaten.

original: zhes pa ni bstan zin pa'i don nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bstan zin pa'i don nyid do //
translated: This is the very meaning that has been taught.

original: de'i phyir btung bar bya ba ni b'a ri ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir btung bar bya ba ni b'a ri ste /
translated: Therefore, that which is to be drunk is the bƒÅra.

original: b'a rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: b'a rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: BƒÅra means conceptualization.

original: ri ni rtag pa ste dgra'i rang bzhin yang rtag pa'o //
analyzed: ri ni rtag pa ste dgra'i rang bzhin yang rtag pa'o //
translated: The mountain is permanent, and the nature of the enemy is also permanent.üîΩThe lord of one's own clan is on the crown, in brief.

original: spyi bor rang gi rigs kyi bdag por 'gyur ro zhes mdor bstan pa'i don rgyas par 'chad de /üîΩrgun ma'i skra la cod pan byas //
analyzed: spyi bor rang gi rigs kyi bdag por 'gyur ro zhes mdor bstan pa'i don rgyas par 'chad de / rgun ma'i skra la cod pan byas //
translated: The meaning is explained in detail.üîΩThe hair of a thief is made into a crest.

original: zhes pa la rkun ma'i skra ni dbyangs pa'i ro'i skra des cod pan bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la rkun ma'i skra ni dbyangs pa'i ro'i skra des cod pan bya'o //
translated: The hair of a thief is the hair of a thief who is a musician. That is made into a crest.

original: de la h'um byung sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: de la h'um byung sbyar bar bya //
translated: Hum should be applied there.

original: zhes pa ni h'um las byung ba mi bskyod pa de der ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni h'um las byung ba mi bskyod pa de der ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Hum arises from hum. Akshobhya is united with that.

original: yang na rkun ma'i sgras rkun ma rnams kyi dngos po ni rkun ma ste /
analyzed: yang na rkun ma'i sgras rkun ma rnams kyi dngos po ni rkun ma ste /
translated: Or, the word thief refers to the state of thieves.

original: ji ltar rkun ma rku ba nyid kyis de rnams kyi rku bar byed pa 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar rkun ma rku ba nyid kyis de rnams kyi rku bar byed pa 'byung ba yin no //
translated: Just as a thief is a thief by the very act of stealing,

original: de bzhin du dbang po dang yul dag kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mngon par zhen pa 'jug pas na yang dag pa'i ye shes 'di rnams brkus nas yod pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du dbang po dang yul dag kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mngon par zhen pa 'jug pas na yang dag pa'i ye shes 'di rnams brkus nas yod pa yin no //
translated: in the same way, the sense faculties and objects are also this correct wisdom, which is stolen by the engagement of the clinging of grasped and grasper.

original: rkun ma'i sgras yul dang dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: rkun ma'i sgras yul dang dbang po rnams so //
translated: The word thief refers to the objects and sense faculties.

original: skra ni sems so //
analyzed: skra ni sems so //
translated: The hair is the mind.

original: yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa'i da rnams kyis byas pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa'i da rnams kyis byas pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The completion is the action of the objects, faculties, and consciousnesses.

original: cod pan ni m'a ma k'i mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: cod pan ni m'a ma k'i mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The crown is Ak·π£obhya, Mamaki.

original: de'i brtsegs ma ni chos 'byung de gzhir gyur ba'i khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa des so //
analyzed: de'i brtsegs ma ni chos 'byung de gzhir gyur ba'i khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa des so //
translated: Its pile is the source of phenomena, the pervaded and the pervader, the basis of that.

original: de la h'um byung thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa sbyar te /üîΩ'byung ba 'dus pa las de bzhin @64a * //
analyzed: de la h'um byung thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa sbyar te / 'byung ba 'dus pa las de bzhin @64a * //
translated: In that, the vajra holder, the method and wisdom inseparable, arisen from h≈´·πÉ, is applied.

original: gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid skyed pa yin no //
analyzed: gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid skyed pa yin no //
translated: From the gathering of the elements, the nature of all tathƒÅgatas is generated.

original: de bas na de nyid la cod pan no //
analyzed: de bas na de nyid la cod pan no //
translated: Therefore, that is the crown.

original: sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa rnams //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa rnams //
translated: The five buddha crowns

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: means

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams rnam par dag pa'i thod pa lnga'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams rnam par dag pa'i thod pa lnga'o //
translated: the five pure buddha crowns of the five tathƒÅgatas.

original: yang na de nyid h'um byung ste sangs rgyas lnga'i thod pa rnams ni lnga ni rgyas par te /
analyzed: yang na de nyid h'um byung ste sangs rgyas lnga'i thod pa rnams ni lnga ni rgyas par te /
translated: Alternatively, that itself is arisen from h≈´·πÉ. The five buddha crowns are the five extensiveüîΩ.

original: sangs rgyas pa de rnams kyi rigs mtha' yas pa'i phyir de nyid thod pa rnams so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas pa de rnams kyi rigs mtha' yas pa'i phyir de nyid thod pa rnams so //
translated: Since those Buddhas are of infinite type, they are the skull-bowls.

original: ka bde ba'i ye shes skyong bar byed pas na yang dag pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas lnga'i thod pa rnams mtha' yas mu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: ka bde ba'i ye shes skyong bar byed pas na yang dag pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas lnga'i thod pa rnams mtha' yas mu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Since they sustain the gnosis of bliss, the skull-bowls of the five Buddhas are of the nature of the infinite, boundless gnosis of the Buddhas.

original: h'um byung la ni rnam par dbye ba med do //
analyzed: h'um byung la ni rnam par dbye ba med do //
translated: There is no differentiation in what arises from H≈™M.

original: gcig dang du mar gyur pa dbyer med pa des nges par gzung ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig dang du mar gyur pa dbyer med pa des nges par gzung ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
translated: Since it is indivisible, one and many, it is of the nature of non-apprehension.

original: rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par 'dzin /
analyzed: rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par 'dzin /
translated: The YogƒÅcƒÅra maintains

original: thod pa sor lnga'i ba'i char byas pas cod pan zhes pa la /
analyzed: thod pa sor lnga'i ba'i char byas pas cod pan zhes pa la /
translated: the crown is made from a skull-bowl five finger-breadths in size.

original: de la thod pa'i dum bu rdo rje thod pa'i phyag rgya sbyin bar bya ste /
analyzed: de la thod pa'i dum bu rdo rje thod pa'i phyag rgya sbyin bar bya ste /

translated: When one is performing the function of giving away one‚Äôs body, one should examine those who are unworthy, because they are small and do not find their fortune, that is, they do not find their fortune in the body.

original: rgyu des na sbyin pa sbyin na gtang bar mi bya ba'i rgyu de'i phyir na sbyin pa rgyu gang gi phyir sbyin par mi bya ste mi gtong ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu des na sbyin pa sbyin na gtang bar mi bya ba'i rgyu de'i phyir na sbyin pa rgyu gang gi phyir sbyin par mi bya ste mi gtong ba'o //
translated: For that reason, when one is giving a gift, one should not give it for that reason, that is, one should not give a gift for the sake of any cause.

original: rdul phra rab bsags pa dpyad pas mi bzod pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyis btang ba yin /
analyzed: rdul phra rab bsags pa dpyad pas mi bzod pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyis btang ba yin /
translated: Because it cannot withstand the analysis of the aggregation of subtle particles, it is naturally given away.

original: yang na / bdag nyid kyis ni gnyid spangs nas //
analyzed: yang na / bdag nyid kyis ni gnyid spangs nas //
translated: Having abandoned sleep oneself,

original: the tshom med par spyod par bya //
analyzed: the tshom med par spyod par bya //
translated: one should practice without doubt.

original: zhes pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la /
translated: With regard to that,

original: bdag nyid ces pa ni rnam par shes pa las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid ces pa ni rnam par shes pa las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
translated: ‚Äúoneself‚Äù is Vajradhara because he is utterly beyond consciousness.

original: bdag nyid spangs nas so //
analyzed: bdag nyid spangs nas so //
translated: having abandoned the self.

original: spyod pa ni 'khyam pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa ni 'khyam pa'o //
translated: Practice is wandering.

original: the tshom med pas thams cad du dogs pa med pa des bskyed par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: the tshom med pas thams cad du dogs pa med pa des bskyed par bya ba yin no //
translated: One should generate it without doubt, without hesitation anywhere.

original: lus kyi sbyin pa byin nas ni //
analyzed: lus kyi sbyin pa byin nas ni //
translated: Having given the gift of the body,

original: phyi nas spyod pa yang dag spyad //üîΩces pa la lus @66a * //
analyzed: phyi nas spyod pa yang dag spyad // ces pa la lus @66a * //
translated: later one should practice the conduct.

original: kyi sgras lus brjod do //
analyzed: kyi sgras lus brjod do //
translated: Here, the word ‚Äúbody‚Äù refers to the body.

original: de'i sbyin pa ni yongs su gtong bas de'i mngon par zhen pa spangs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sbyin pa ni yongs su gtong bas de'i mngon par zhen pa spangs pa'o //
translated: Its gift is the abandonment of attachment to it.

original: de sbyin pa ni de yang spangs pa'o //
analyzed: de sbyin pa ni de yang spangs pa'o //
translated: The gift of that is the abandonment of that.

original: 'dis ni mngon par zhen pa'i yongs su spangs pa yang mngon par zhen pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'dis ni mngon par zhen pa'i yongs su spangs pa yang mngon par zhen pa nyid de /
translated: This is the abandonment of attachment to the abandonment of attachment.

original: de'i mngon par zhen pa de yang med pa yin /
analyzed: de'i mngon par zhen pa de yang med pa yin /
translated: That attachment to the abandonment of attachment is also non-existent.

original: spyod pa ni 'khyam pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa ni 'khyam pa'o //
translated: Practice is wandering.

original: spyad pa ni yang dag par sgrub pa la snyoms par zhugs te mthar thug thob pa yin no //
analyzed: spyad pa ni yang dag par sgrub pa la snyoms par zhugs te mthar thug thob pa yin no //
translated: Practice is the attainment of the ultimate through engagement in the practice of accomplishment.

original: skal dang skal med rnam dpyad nas //
analyzed: skal dang skal med rnam dpyad nas //
translated: Having examined who is worthy and unworthy,

original: de phyir sbyin pa sbyin mi bya //
analyzed: de phyir sbyin pa sbyin mi bya //
translated: one should not give the gift.

original: zhes pa la skal pa ni cha shas zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa la skal pa ni cha shas zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúFortune‚Äù is a synonym for ‚Äúpart.‚Äù

original: de yang thabs k'a li'i tshul gyis n'a da'i phreng ba'i cha med pa'i cha yin no //
analyzed: de yang thabs k'a li'i tshul gyis n'a da'i phreng ba'i cha med pa'i cha yin no //
translated: Moreover, by the method of the kƒÅli, it is the part of the garland of nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s that is partless.

original: skal med ni cha med pa ste a'a li'i tshul gyis n'a da'i phreng ba yin no //
analyzed: skal med ni cha med pa ste a'a li'i tshul gyis n'a da'i phreng ba yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúUnfortunate‚Äù is partless, by the method of the ƒÅli, it is the garland of nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s.

original: yang na skal ba ni cha shas yan lag gi rang bzhin skye ba'i rang bzhin des byang chub kyi sems zla ba a'a li'i phreng ba nyid do //
analyzed: yang na skal ba ni cha shas yan lag gi rang bzhin skye ba'i rang bzhin des byang chub kyi sems zla ba a'a li'i phreng ba nyid do //
translated: Alternatively, ‚Äúfortune‚Äù is the nature of the parts, the nature of arising. By that, bodhicitta is the garland of the ƒÅli moon.

original: skal med ni cha med pa bdag med pa'i rang bzhin nyi ma k'a li'i tshul gyis n'a da'i phreng ba'o //
analyzed: skal med ni cha med pa bdag med pa'i rang bzhin nyi ma k'a li'i tshul gyis n'a da'i phreng ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúUnfortunate‚Äù is the nature of the partless, the nature of selflessness. By the method of the kƒÅli sun, it is the garland of nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s.

original: de ltar skal dang skal med kyi sgras n'a da'i phreng ba gsung rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de ltar skal dang skal med kyi sgras n'a da'i phreng ba gsung rdo rje'o //
translated: In that way, the garland of nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s is the vajra of speech, expressed by the words ‚Äúfortune‚Äù and ‚Äúunfortunate.‚Äù

original: de'i dpyad pa ni dpyad pa dang bral bas dpyad pa ste /
analyzed: de'i dpyad pa ni dpyad pa dang bral bas dpyad pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúAnalysis‚Äù is free from analysis because it is partless.

original: cha med pa nyid des dpyad pas cha med pas sbyin pa yongs su btang ngo //
analyzed: cha med pa nyid des dpyad pas cha med pas sbyin pa yongs su btang ngo //
translated: By analyzing that partlessness, one should give the gift of the partless.

original: de'i phyir ni rgyu de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir ni rgyu de'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù is the reason.

original: sbyin mi bya ni sbyin par mi bya'o //
analyzed: sbyin mi bya ni sbyin par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not give means one should not give.

original: btang ba'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: btang ba'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Because of the nature of giving up, is the meaning.

original: 'dis ni bdag las byung ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'dzin pa ldog go //
analyzed: 'dis ni bdag las byung ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'dzin pa ldog go //
translated: This stops the grasping of consciousness arising from self.

original: lus kyi sbyin pas lus kyi mngon par zhen pa yang ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi sbyin pas lus kyi mngon par zhen pa yang ngo //
translated: By the gift of the body, there is also the clinging to the body.

original: skal dang skal med rnam dpyad nas //
analyzed: skal dang skal med rnam dpyad nas //
translated: Having analyzed the fortunate and the unfortunate,

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: this is said.

original: mtshan ma la chags pa yang chags pa gsum las grol bas chags pa thams cad spangs pa'i rang bzhin nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: mtshan ma la chags pa yang chags pa gsum las grol bas chags pa thams cad spangs pa'i rang bzhin nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: Also attached to signs, one is liberated from the three attachments. The nature of abandoning all attachments is the vajra holder.

original: 'di nyid de kho na nyid dang ldan pa'i dpyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid de kho na nyid dang ldan pa'i dpyod pa'o //
translated: This is the analysis endowed with reality.

original: bza' bca' de bzhin btung ba nyid //
analyzed: bza' bca' de bzhin btung ba nyid //
translated: Food, drink, and likewise, chewing,üîΩwhatever is found, that is to be eaten.

original: ji ltar rnyed pa de bzhin bza' ba ni zan dron la sogs pa'o //üîΩbca' ba ni 'bras chan la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rnyed pa de bzhin bza' ba ni zan dron la sogs pa'o // bca' ba ni 'bras chan la sogs pa'o //
translated: Chewing is rice and so forth.

original: btung ba ni 'o ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: btung ba ni 'o ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: Drinking is milk and so forth.

original: de thams cad gang ji lta ba bzhin gyi rnam pas bza' ba'am 'gal ba yang rung ba'o //
analyzed: de thams cad gang ji lta ba bzhin gyi rnam pas bza' ba'am 'gal ba yang rung ba'o //
translated: All of that is to be eaten or rejected according to the circumstances.

original: rnyed pa bza' ni nye bar longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: rnyed pa bza' ni nye bar longs spyod pa'o //
translated: The food is the enjoyment of the object.

original: de bas na zhen pa tsam du mi bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na zhen pa tsam du mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should not be attached to mere attachment.

original: yid 'ong mi 'ong rnam rtog phyir //
analyzed: yid 'ong mi 'ong rnam rtog phyir //
translated: Because of the discrimination of the pleasant and unpleasant,

original: zhes pa la zhen @66b pa'i mngon par zhen pa de mi bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la zhen @66b pa'i mngon par zhen pa de mi bya'o //
translated: the attachment is the manifest attachment. One should not do that.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: yid 'ong ni 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: yid 'ong ni 'dod pa'o //
translated: The pleasant is the desirable.

original: mi 'ong ba ni 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'ong ba ni 'dod pa'o //
translated: The unpleasant is the undesirable.

original: rnam pa gnyi ga brtag pa nyid rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu nyid yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyi ga brtag pa nyid rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu nyid yin no //
translated: Both aspects are the cause of discrimination.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,üîΩ the analysis of what is to be eaten and what is not to be eaten,

original: bza' dang bca' min dpyad pa dang // de bzhin btung dang btung min nyid //
analyzed: bza' dang bca' min dpyad pa dang // de bzhin btung dang btung min nyid //
translated: and likewise, what is to be drunk and what is not to be drunk,

original: bgrod dang bgrod min sngags pa yis //
analyzed: bgrod dang bgrod min sngags pa yis //
translated: the analysis of what is to be traversed and what is not to be traversed, the mantra practitioner

original: rnam rtog nyid du mi bya'o //
analyzed: rnam rtog nyid du mi bya'o //
translated: should not make them into discriminations.

original: zhes pa'i don ni gsal ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa'i don ni gsal ba nyid do //
translated: The meaning is clear.

original: yang na bza' ba dang bza' bar mi bya ba ni lus kyi mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: yang na bza' ba dang bza' bar mi bya ba ni lus kyi mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: Or, what is to be eaten and what is not to be eaten is the manifest attachment of the body.

original: bca' ba dang bca' bar mi bya ba ni ngag gi mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: bca' ba dang bca' bar mi bya ba ni ngag gi mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: What is to be chewed and what is not to be chewed is the manifest attachment of speech.

original: btung bar bya ba dang btung bar bya ba ma yin pa ni sems kyi mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: btung bar bya ba dang btung bar bya ba ma yin pa ni sems kyi mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: What is to be drunk and what is not to be drunk is the mind‚Äôs attachment.

original: de ltar 'di gsum ji ltar rim pa gang gis so //
analyzed: de ltar 'di gsum ji ltar rim pa gang gis so //
translated: Thus, these three are in the order in which they are mentioned.

original: rnyed pa ni rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: rnyed pa ni rnyed pa'o //
translated: Gain is gain.

original: bza' ba ni mngon par zhen pa med pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: bza' ba ni mngon par zhen pa med pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa yin no //
translated: Eating is the nature of non-attachment.

original: de bas na 'dir rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i mngon par zhen pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: de bas na 'dir rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i mngon par zhen pa rnams la'o //
translated: Therefore, here, for those who are attached to the indivisibility of the three vajras,

original: zhen pa ni mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: zhen pa ni mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: attachment is attachment.

original: mi bya ba ni bya ba'i tshul gyis bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: mi bya ba ni bya ba'i tshul gyis bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: What is not to be done is not to be generated by the method of doing.

original: yid 'ong mi 'ong rnam rtog phyir ni yid 'ong mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: yid 'ong mi 'ong rnam rtog phyir ni yid 'ong mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: Because of the discrimination of what is pleasant and unpleasant, there is attachment to what is pleasant.

original: mi 'ong mngon par zhen pa med pa ste bya ba'i sgo nas mngon par zhen pa gang yongs su spangs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'ong mngon par zhen pa med pa ste bya ba'i sgo nas mngon par zhen pa gang yongs su spangs par gyur pa'o //
translated: There is no attachment to what is unpleasant, which is the complete abandonment of attachment by way of action.

original: de yang mngon par zhen pa nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa nyid de /
analyzed: de yang mngon par zhen pa nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa nyid de /
translated: Moreover, that is discrimination itself by way of attachment.

original: de bas na zhen par mi bya'o ni mngon par zhen pa med pa yang mi bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na zhen par mi bya'o ni mngon par zhen pa med pa yang mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should not cling to it, nor should one be without clinging.

original: de ltar na bza' ba dang bza' min zhen pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar na bza' ba dang bza' min zhen pa ni /
translated: Thus, the clinging to what is to be eaten and what is not to be eaten is

original: bza' ni lus kyi mngon zhen no //
analyzed: bza' ni lus kyi mngon zhen no //
translated: the clinging to the body as what is to be eaten.

original: bza' min de'i mngon par zhen pa spangs pa'o //
analyzed: bza' min de'i mngon par zhen pa spangs pa'o //
translated: What is not to be eaten is the abandonment of that clinging.

original: de ltar gnyi ga dpyad pa tsam yang de kho na nyid dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas mi bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar gnyi ga dpyad pa tsam yang de kho na nyid dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas mi bya ste /
translated: Thus, the yogƒ´ endowed with reality should not even analyze both in this way.

original: bya ba'i sgo nas bskyed par mi bya'o //
analyzed: bya ba'i sgo nas bskyed par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not generate [the view] through action.

original: btung dang btung min zhen pa ni /
analyzed: btung dang btung min zhen pa ni /
translated: The clinging to what is to be drunk and what is not to be drunk is

original: btung ba chu'i khams gsung rdo rje de la mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: btung ba chu'i khams gsung rdo rje de la mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: the clinging to the water element, which is speech-vajra.

original: btung min ni mngon par zhen pa de med pa'o //
analyzed: btung min ni mngon par zhen pa de med pa'o //
translated: What is not to be drunk is the absence of that clinging.

original: 'di gnyi ga yang bgrod dang bgrod min zhes pa la /
analyzed: 'di gnyi ga yang bgrod dang bgrod min zhes pa la /
translated: Both of these are in terms of what is to be traversed and what is not to be traversed.

original: bgrod pa ni sems kyi mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: bgrod pa ni sems kyi mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: What is to be traversed is the clinging of the mind.

original: bgrod min ni mngon par zhen pa de med pa'o //
analyzed: bgrod min ni mngon par zhen pa de med pa'o //
translated: What is not to be traversed is the absence of that clinging.

original: de ltar sku gsung thugs kyi mngon par zhen pa dang / yid kyi mngon par zhen pa dang / rnam par rtog pa 'di gnyis ka yang mi bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar sku gsung thugs kyi mngon par zhen pa dang / yid kyi mngon par zhen pa dang / rnam par rtog pa 'di gnyis ka yang mi bya ste /
translated: Thus, one should not engage in either of these two: the manifest clinging to body, speech, and mind, and the manifest clinging of the mind, and conceptual thought.

original: bya ba'i sgo nas rtog pa'i yul du mi bya'o zhes pa'i don to //üîΩde @67a * //
analyzed: bya ba'i sgo nas rtog pa'i yul du mi bya'o zhes pa'i don to // de @67a * //
translated: The meaning is that one should not engage in conceptual thought in terms of action.

original: ltar gang rtog pa thams cad spangs pa nyid kyis de'i bya ba yang rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin pas bla mar rtog pa dang de la phyag 'tshal ba'i rtog pa yang kun du yod pa ma yin par dogs pa bsus nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: ltar gang rtog pa thams cad spangs pa nyid kyis de'i bya ba yang rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin pas bla mar rtog pa dang de la phyag 'tshal ba'i rtog pa yang kun du yod pa ma yin par dogs pa bsus nas gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, since the action of one who has abandoned all conceptual thought does not exist in any way, fearing that the conceptual thought of a guru and the conceptual thought of paying homage to him might not exist at all, he says:

original: dngos grub rnyed pa'i slob ma gang /
analyzed: dngos grub rnyed pa'i slob ma gang /
translated: The disciple who has attained power

original: yang dag ye shes snang ba'o //
analyzed: yang dag ye shes snang ba'o //
translated: is the light of perfect pristine consciousness.

original: mnar med spang ba'i rgyu yi phyir /
analyzed: mnar med spang ba'i rgyu yi phyir /
translated: In order to abandon the Avƒ´ci hell,

original: grub pas bla ma mngon phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: grub pas bla ma mngon phyag 'tshal //
translated: the adept should pay homage to the guru.

original: zhes bya ba'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: gzhan lta zhog gi spyod pa'i bya ba la zhugs pa rnam par mi rtog pas sbyangs pas /
analyzed: gzhan lta zhog gi spyod pa'i bya ba la zhugs pa rnam par mi rtog pas sbyangs pas /
translated: Forget about others; even the action of the one who engages in the conduct is not conceptualized by the purification of nonconceptuality.

original: bde bar dngos grub kyang phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa de lta bur gyur ba'i slob ma de yang bla ma ston pa la phyag 'tshal te /
analyzed: bde bar dngos grub kyang phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa de lta bur gyur ba'i slob ma de yang bla ma ston pa la phyag 'tshal te /
translated: having bowed to the Guru, the Teacher,

original: rnam pa thams cad kyis 'dud de bya ba byed do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kyis 'dud de bya ba byed do //
translated: with all his being, performs the action.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: mnar med spang ba'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mnar med spang ba'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to abandon Avici.

original: de lta ma yin na yang mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen por ltung ba'i don to //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na yang mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen por ltung ba'i don to //
translated: Otherwise, he would fall into the great Avici hell.

original: yang na dngos grub rnyed pa ni /
analyzed: yang na dngos grub rnyed pa ni /
translated: Or else, having attained the Siddhi,

original: de phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa yang ngo //
analyzed: de phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa yang ngo //
translated: he has attained the Great Seal Siddhi.

original: bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i rtog pa las rnam par grol bar gyur pas nyid bdag med pa'i rang bzhin de lta bur gyur ba'i slob mas rnal 'byor pas kyang ngo //
analyzed: bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i rtog pa las rnam par grol bar gyur pas nyid bdag med pa'i rang bzhin de lta bur gyur ba'i slob mas rnal 'byor pas kyang ngo //
translated: The disciple who has become such, who is by nature devoid of self,

original: mngon phyag 'tshal ni bla ma la mngon par btung pa ste /
analyzed: mngon phyag 'tshal ni bla ma la mngon par btung pa ste /
translated: having bowed to the Guru,

original: mchod pa'i rang bzhin gyis blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: mchod pa'i rang bzhin gyis blta bar bya'o //
translated: should be seen as having the nature of worship.

original: bla ma zhes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin no //
analyzed: bla ma zhes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin no //
translated: The Guru is the Vajra-Holder.

original: 'dis ni bla ma nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa ste rang nyid bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni bla ma nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa ste rang nyid bdag med ma'o //
translated: This is the Guru himself, the Vajra-Holder, who is Nairatmya.

original: de bas na gnyi ga dbyer med pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bas na gnyi ga dbyer med pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, because of the realization of the non-duality of the two,

original: dngos grub ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes so //üîΩyang dag ye shes snang ba'o //
analyzed: dngos grub ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes so // yang dag ye shes snang ba'o //
translated: the power is the non-conceptual intuition.üîΩThe light of the intuition of reality

original: zhes pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes spro ba'i rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: zhes pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes spro ba'i rang bzhin yin no //
translated: is the nature of the emanation of the intuition of reality.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mnar med spang ba'i rgyu'i phyir te /
analyzed: mnar med spang ba'i rgyu'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is the cause of the abandonment of the Avici.

original: mnar med pa'i rba rlabs med pa yin pas mnar med pa ni bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: mnar med pa'i rba rlabs med pa yin pas mnar med pa ni bdag med ma'o //
translated: The Avici is Nairatmya, because it is free from the waves of Avici.

original: de'i spang ba ni yongs su spangs pa ste rgyu des ni rgyu des na'o //
analyzed: de'i spang ba ni yongs su spangs pa ste rgyu des ni rgyu des na'o //
translated: The abandonment of that is the complete abandonment.

original: 'dis ci bstan ce na dngos grub rnyed pa'i slob ma zhes pa ni bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: 'dis ci bstan ce na dngos grub rnyed pa'i slob ma zhes pa ni bdag med ma'o //
translated: What is taught by this? The disciple who has attained the power is Nairatmya.

original: gcig tu nges pa'i stong pa'i gsob slar phug nas /
analyzed: gcig tu nges pa'i stong pa'i gsob slar phug nas /
translated: Having again pierced the void which is of one nature,

original: rtog par gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe 'di'i rang bzhin gyi don dman par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtog par gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe 'di'i rang bzhin gyi don dman par 'gyur ro //

original: de bas na ston pa rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin dmigs pas de'i tshe de las gzhan ci yang med pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na ston pa rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin dmigs pas de'i tshe de las gzhan ci yang med pa yin no //

analyzed: de dbyer med @67b par yongs su shes pa las dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de yang gnyi ga dbyer med pa nyid kyis yid dag pa'i ye shes snang ba'o ni /

original: mnar med spang ba'i rgyu yi phyir //
analyzed: mnar med spang ba'i rgyu yi phyir //

analyzed: zhes pa ni /

original: med ni bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: med ni bdag med ma'o //

analyzed: mnar ba ni spro ba'i tshul des bla ma rdo rje 'dzin na'o //
translated: Torture‚Äù is the guru Vajradhara through the method of delight.

original: gnyi ga yang dbyer med pas mnar med pa zhes gcig gi tshig ste /
analyzed: gnyi ga yang dbyer med pas mnar med pa zhes gcig gi tshig ste /

original: de dbyer med par rtogs pa yang de'i rtog pa yin te /
analyzed: de dbyer med par rtogs pa yang de'i rtog pa yin te /

original: de rgyu spang ba'i rgyus rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mngon par byang chub pa 'di ni 'thob po //
analyzed: de rgyu spang ba'i rgyus rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mngon par byang chub pa 'di ni 'thob po //
translated: By the cause of abandoning that, one attains this manifest enlightenment of omniscience, which is the nature of emptiness endowed with the most sublime of all aspects.

original: bdag nyid bdag med ma bla ma rdo rje 'dzin gnyi ga dbyer med pa nyid dngos grub yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid bdag med ma bla ma rdo rje 'dzin gnyi ga dbyer med pa nyid dngos grub yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: The nondual vajra holder, the guru who is the embodiment of the absence of self in phenomena, is the very siddhi itself, and not anything else.

analyzed: spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas dngos grub tu yang shes par bya'o //

original: bslab dang cha byad rnam par grol //
analyzed: bslab dang cha byad rnam par grol //

analyzed: ngo tsha'i bya ba rnam par spangs //

analyzed: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyi // yo gis rnam dpyad snying rje che //

analyzed: de bas na rnal 'byor ba'o //

original: snying rje che zhes pa smos te /

analyzed: de rnam par grol ba ni /

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /

analyzed: ngo tsha ni mi gsal ba'i tshul gyis bdag med ma'o //

analyzed: gnyis su med par rtogs pa rang byung ba rnam par gnas pa'o //
